summary: Project to implement a UI with responsive, separately clickable tabs across all screen sizes, add weekend (Sat/Sun) checkbox options with weekend data included in summaries, and support generating filtered reports in PDF or XLSM formats.

existing_features.title: Update the Ledger page so all main sections (Travellers, Daily, Summary, Car, Overall) are always available as separate, clearly clickable tabs on every screen size (including desktop), rather than switching to a non-tabbed multi-column layout on large screens.
Add user controls (checkboxes) to enable/disable tracking for Saturdays and Sundays separately, and use these controls to determine whether weekend dates are editable in the Daily Participation grid.

Include weekend data in summaries by calculating and displaying weekday vs weekend trip counts (and associated charges) based on the Saturday/Sunday inclusion toggles, and ensure totals reflect included weekend days.
Add report generation that supports exporting filtered reports to PDF and an Excel-compatible format (preferably .xlsx), with multiple user-selectable filters for what data to include in the report.

Apply a cohesive visual theme across the updated tabs and new controls (consistent spacing, typography, and component styling) without changing app functionality; choose a distinct palette that is not blue/purple and use it consistently.

new_feature_requests.summary: Apply the specified UI design to the application
Create separate clickable tabs for all tabs, consistent across all screen sizes (responsive tab navigation)
Add Saturday/Sunday checkboxes and include weekend data calculations in the summary
Add report generation (PDF and/or .XLSM) with multiple filters

projectName: Responsive tab navigation, weekend inclusion controls, and filtered PDF/Excel report export
